Title: Data Science Analyst
Description:
For the Central Team of Generali Global Corporate & Commercial (GC&C), we are looking for a Data Science Analyst to join our Insurance Department. Reporting to the Head of Technical Excellence, this position is key to leveraging data insights for comprehensive technical analysis, pricing strategies, and effective portfolio management. With a dynamic, cross-functional approach, the role includes demanding data integration across key domains such as Underwriting, Risk Engineering, and Claims, thereby contributing significantly to the company's strategic objectives. In addition, you will contribute to the development of the sustainability agenda of GC&C, working on carbon emission, green energy, and climate change initiatives.




Main responsibilities:




Portfolio Management

Supporting the analysis of the overall GC&C portfolio results, trends and patterns;
Designing and deploying the portfolio management discipline;
Implementing the portfolio monitoring tools;
Assisting BU in the target setting and supporting BU in achieving targets;
Performing data quality checks at all stages of portfolio management;
Preparation and steering of Portfolio review meetings;
Assisting UW functions in steering the business accordingly.

Innovation

Working collaboratively on pioneering new actuarial tools, integrating Machine Learning algorithms to enhance predictive capabilities;
Actively participate in defining business requirements to evolve the TechEx technology stack, in partnership with Operations;
Facilitate training sessions for the GC&C underwriting community on the TechEx tool suite, promoting skill enhancement and tool.

Sustainability and Net Zero Transition

Driving forward GC&C sustainability initiatives also in collaboration with Group Head Office;
Contributing to the development of a technical framework to embed Net Zero targets into GC&C underwriting strategy.




Requirements

The ideal candidate will meet the following requirements:




Studied Actuarial Science, Mathematics or Statistics or other quantitative disciplines, e.g. Engineering, Physics etc.
Quantitative, analytical mindset, problem solving skills
Insurance business processes knowledge experience is welcome
Ability to build lasting relationships
Strong communication and presentation skills
Familiarity with Python and R is valued
Must be fluent in Italian, English, additional languages are an advantage




Company Profile

Generali is a major player in the global insurance industry ‚Äì a strategic and highly important sector for the growth, development and welfare of modern societies.

Over almost 200 years, we have built a multinational group that is present in more than 50 countries, with 470 companies and nearly 82,000 employees. Our group aims to become the standard bearer and industry leader in the European retail insurance market, building on our existing base of 50 million retail clients, out of an overall total of 72 million.

Global Corporate & Commercial is the Generali Group unit developing P&C business and insurance services for medium and large companies. The unit acts on a global scale and deploys an integrated approach at Group level with a central management team and specialized teams active in individual countries. Through GC&C, Generali aims to become a key world player in the corporate-commercial segment.




Generali is proud to be an inclusive employer that considers applicants regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, religion, political views, marital status or philosophy of life.

If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation or assistance, we will support you during the selection process.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Got the drive to shape the future of insurance?

At Prima, you could take on a whole new challenge. As part of our global community, you‚Äôd be in the driving seat of your career; learning and growing with a top-tier team around you. Prima is a place where no matter who you are or what your role is ‚Äî your voice is valued.

Back in 2015, we embarked on a mission: to provide great value car insurance that is designed for everyone. And we‚Äôve come a long way, we‚Äôve created a culture where we can fuel each other‚Äôs success. But we need your expertise, as we steer things in a new and exciting direction.

You‚Äôre probably thinking‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòThat sounds pretty good‚Äô. We agree.

As well as great colleagues and engaging projects, there are loads of ways we can help you do the best work of your life. We‚Äôve shaped our offering to place a focus on wellbeing, autonomy and development. We see benefits as the fuel that will empower you to succeed, if you decide to embark on this journey with us.

Step into the spotlight at Prima in the Pricing team and play a pivotal role in making Prima the most successful insurance company in the world. With the power of creativity, data and machine learning, you'll be at the forefront of our competitive advantage: predict the future and set prices accordingly.

ü§∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Working in a way that works for you

We believe in work-life balance and flexibility. Whether you like working from the office, home or a mixture of both. We‚Äôll help you find a balance that works best for you. We even have a policy that means you can work from any location for 30 days a year. We trust you to steer us forward.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

Step into the spotlight at Prima as a Data Scientist of the Pricing team and play a pivotal role in making Prima the most successful insurance company in the world. With the power of creativity, data and machine learning, you'll be at the forefront of our competitive advantage: predict the future and set prices accordingly.

As a Data Scientist at Prima, your role is crucial in leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and advanced data analytics to decode the risks and opportunities presented by each new client. Your work directly influences our company's growth and long-term success, contributing to the achievement of our strategic goals.

Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for:


Academic Excellence : Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Physics, Engineering Mathematics, Engineering Physics, or Statistics are a plus.
Experience Not Required : No prior work experience? No problem! We're eager to invest in your talent and education.
Analytical Prowess : Strong quantitative, logical, and analytical skills are essential. At Prima, you'll tackle diverse and stimulating challenges that will put your skills to the test.
Curiosity and Innovation : We value curiosity, proactivity, and pragmatism. You'll be encouraged to pursue common goals in original and innovative ways, shaping the future with your ideas.


We're Also Interested In Candidates Who


Have international experience and are fluent in English and Italian.
Possess a solid foundation in programming and machine learning.
Know how to create and manipulate datasets using data mining languages like MySQL or Redshift.


Research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

If you're curious about experiencing a day in the life of a Data Scientist, take a look at this video from our Head of Pricing & Underwriting Italy.

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

Title: DATA SCIENTIST
Description:
Excellence √® un gruppo multi-boutique formato da pi√π societ√† con diversa specializzazione: dalla Consulenza Strategica, al ridisegno dei modelli operativi, e al Change Management, fino a coprire temi pi√π innovativi come la Digital Disruption oppure la transizione dei modelli di business in chiave ESG.

Il Gruppo √® stato fondato nel 2007 e rappresenta uno dei pi√π significativi casi di successo di start-up che in breve tempo √® riuscita a crescere ed affermarsi nel settore dei professional services.




Dataskills opera a 360¬∞ nel settore della Data Science, aiutando ad estrarre valore dal patrimonio di dati aziendale. Leader italiano in questo campo, ricerca e sviluppa negli ambiti di Business Intelligence, Big Data Analytics, Analisi Predittiva, Artificial Intelligence, e IOT e collabora con le principali aziende dell‚Äôindustria 4.0.




Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una risorsa brillante da inserire nel ruolo di: DATA SCIENTIST




Cosa farai?

Svilupperai soluzioni avanzate di Predictive Analytics ed AI Generativa progettando modelli di Machine Learning e architetture AI per supportare le decisioni strategiche aziendali;
Riceverai supporto e formazione da esperti del settore per affinare costantemente le tue competenze;
Lavorerai su progetti sfidanti che richiederanno l'applicazione di tecniche di data science all'avanguardia;
Prenderai parte allo sviluppo delle competenze interne all‚Äôarea DataSkills e contribuirai alla crescita dell‚Äôazienda portando idee, spunti individuali e proposte di nuovi progetti e prodotti, seguendone lo sviluppo verso i clienti.




Chi ricerchiamo?

Esperienza di almeno 1 anno in ruoli relativi a Data Analytics, Machine Learning o GenAI;
Passione per i dati e abilit√† nell‚Äôanalisi di informazioni complesse;
Capacit√† di presentazione, comunicazione e sintesi di informazioni tecniche;
Padronanza consolidata di Python, utilizzato come principale strumento di analisi e sviluppo di modelli predittivi;
Solida competenza in SQL, con abilit√† nel progettare query.
Conoscenza di algoritmi, modelli e principali tecniche di Machine Learning
Ottime doti relazionali, capacit√† organizzative, proattivit√† ed entusiasmo;
Capacit√† di leadership, capacit√† relazionale e predisposizione al lavoro di gruppo;
Conoscenza della lingua inglese al livello B2 o superiore (Riferimento: Common European Framework of Reference for Languages);
Conoscenza della lingua italiana al livello C1 o superiore (Riferimento: CEFR Common European Framework of Reference for Languages).




Gradita, ma non essenziale:

Esperienza nella costruzione di Data Warehouse/Data Lake
Esperienza con Apache Spark ed Azure Databricks




Perch√© Gruppo Excellence?

Farai parte della nostra crescita

Sarai coinvolto/a in progetti strategici e innovativi per lo sviluppo del business aziendale e potrai lavorare direttamente con il Top Management delle aziende cliente. Chi entrer√† a fare parte della nostra squadra trover√† un ambiente di lavoro giovane, smart, proattivo e stimolante e avr√† la possibilit√† di lavorare nell‚Äôambito di progetti dinamici per aziende leader nei mercati di riferimento.

Svilupperai il tuo potenziale

Avrai accesso alla nostra piattaforma di formazione Excellence Academy, con un catalogo sempre aggiornato di corsi su hard e soft skills che accresceranno le tue competenze su numerose tematiche. Premiamo il merito e il talento, anche attraverso un percorso di carriera personalizzato: ti daremo la possibilit√† di realizzare aspirazioni personali in linea con gli obiettivi aziendali.

Siamo un‚Äôorganizzazione orizzontale in cui la voce di ciascuno viene accolta e valorizzata!

Ci impegniamo a promuovere e a tutelare il valore delle nostre persone, necessarie e fondamentali per lo sviluppo del knowledge aziendale.

Avrai un ottimo work-life balance

Troverai una policy che supporta il lavoro flessibile e la possibilit√† di lavorare da casa quando necessario. Ti riserviamo un piano welfare per acquisto abbonamenti mezzi pubblici, buoni spesa, corsi, ingressi cinema, abbonamenti palestre, viaggi e molto altro.

Lavorerai in un ambiente inclusivo ed equo

Valorizziamo la diversit√†, l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† lavorative. Il nostro processo di selezione √® meritocratico e lontano da qualsivoglia forma di discriminazione diretta o indiretta, nel rispetto dei migliori standard internazionali e delle leggi applicabili (inclusi ma non limitati alla L. 903/77).

Title: DATA SCIENCE CONSULTANT MILAN/ROMA
Description:
Management Solutions is an international consulting firm whose core mission is to deliver business, risk, financial, organisational and process-related advisory services, targeting both functional aspects and the implementation of related technologies. We currently have a multidisciplinary team (functional, mathematical, technical and systems integration) of around 4,000 professionals.




We operate through 50 offices (22 in Europe, 23 in the Americas, 3 in Asia, 1 in Africa and 1 in Oceania) from where we regularly serve clients that operate in more than 50 countries across five major geographical areas (Europe, Americas, Asia, Africa and Oceania).




Role

¬∑ Statistical data processing (data mining)

¬∑ Predictive modeling using machine learning and data science techniques

¬∑ Trend modeling (time series, ARIMA models)

¬∑ Development of simulation models (Monte Carlo)

¬∑ Review and validation of rating and scoring, RAROC and risk- parameter models

¬∑ Mathematical support to the business: developing algorithms, statistics and probability models

¬∑ R&D projects




We look for candidates like you

- Recent graduates or final year

- Postgraduate studies students from disciplines relating to Mathematics, Statistics, are an asset especially in Econometrics, Data Science, Big Data Science, Quantitative Data, Mathematical Finance, Finance or similar. Quantitative Methods, Financial

- Knowledge of other Mathematics, Physics‚Ä¶ languages desirable.

- Should desirably have

- Get-up-and-go attitude, knowledge of maturity, responsibility modeling techniques (logit, GLM, and strong work ethic. time trees, random forests,

- Strong ability to learn clustering) statistical programming quickly.languages (SAS, R, Python, Matlab)

- Able to integrate easily and big data tools (Hadoop, Hive, into multidisciplinary etc). teams.

- Solid academic record.

- Strong computer skills.




What we offer

We offer you the possibility to join a firm that provides all you need to develop your talent to the fullest:




- Working in the highest-profile consulting projects in the industry,

- for the largest companies, leaders of their respective markets,

- alongside top industry management as they face challenges at the national and global level,

- as part of an extraordinary team of professionals whose values and corporate culture are a benchmark for the industry.




Training

- Ongoing training plan, with approximately 10% of business turnover spent on training.

- Specialist knowledge courses, external expert courses, professional skills

courses and language courses.

- Last year our staff as a whole received over 375,000 hours of training

spanning more than 150 courses.




Career plan

- Clearly defined career plan.

- Internal promotion based solely on merit.

- Partnership-based management model offers all professionals the opportunity to become part of the Firm‚Äôs group of partners.




Complementary activities

- University: we maintain a close relationship with the world‚Äôs most prestigious universities.

- Social Action: we organize more than 30 community support activities.

- Sports Club: internal and external tournaments.




________________________________________________________________________________________




Il tuo ruolo

‚Ä¢ Elaborazione statistica dei dati (data mining).

‚Ä¢ Costruzione di modelli predittivi utilizzando tecniche di machine learning e data science.

‚Ä¢ Modellazione dei Trend (serie temporali, modelli ARIMA).

‚Ä¢ Sviluppo di modelli di simulazione (Monte Carlo).

‚Ä¢ Revisione e convalida di modelli di rating e scoring, RAROC e parametri di rischio.

‚Ä¢ Supporto matematico al business: sviluppo di algoritmi, analisi statistiche e modelli probabilistici.

‚Ä¢ Progetti di R&S.




Cerchiamo candidati come te

- Neolaureato o studente all‚Äôultimo anno in discipline relative a Matematica, Statistica, Econometria, Data Science, Big Data, Matematica Finanziaria e Fisica.

- La conoscenza di tecniche di modellazione (logit, GLM, serie temporali, random forests, clustering), linguaggi di programmazione statistica (SAS, R, Python, Matlab) e strumenti di big data (Hadoop, Hive, etc.) √® auspicabile.

- Solido percorso accademico.

- Corsi Post Laurea e/o corsi di specializzazione sono un plus, specialmente in Data Science, Finanza Quantitativa o simili.

- La conoscenza di altre lingue √® auspicabile.

- Attitudine proattiva, maturit√† e responsabilit√† oltre a una forte etica del lavoro.

- Forte propensione all‚Äôapprendimento rapido.

- Abilit√† di integrarsi facilmente in team multi-disciplinari.

- Solide computer skills.




Cosa offriamo

Ti offriamo la possibilit√† di entrare a far parte di un'azienda che fornisce tutto il necessario per sviluppare al massimo il tuo talento:

- Lavorare nei progetti di consulenza di pi√π alto profilo del settore,

- per le pi√π grandi aziende, leader dei loro rispettivi mercati,

- al fianco dei top manager del settore mentre affrontano le sfide a livello nazionale e globale,

Management Solutions is an international consulting firm whose core mission is to deliver business, risk, financial, organisational and process-related advisory services, targeting both functional aspects and the implementation of related technologies. We currently have a multidisciplinary team (functional, mathematical, technical and systems integration) of around 4,000 professionals.


We operate through 50 offices (22 in Europe, 23 in the Americas, 3 in Asia, 1 in Africa and 1 in Oceania) from where we regularly serve clients that operate in more than 50 countries across five major geographical areas (Europe, Americas, Asia, Africa and Oceania).


Role

¬∑ Statistical data processing (data mining)

¬∑ Predictive modeling using machine learning and data science techniques

¬∑ Trend modeling (time series, ARIMA models)

¬∑ Development of simulation models (Monte Carlo)

¬∑ Review and validation of rating and scoring, RAROC and risk- parameter models

¬∑ Mathematical support to the business: developing algorithms, statistics and probability models

¬∑ R&D projects


We look for candidates like you

- Recent graduates or final year

- Postgraduate studies students from disciplines relating to Mathematics, Statistics, are an asset especially in Econometrics, Data Science, Big Data Science, Quantitative Data, Mathematical Finance, Finance or similar. Quantitative Methods, Financial

- Knowledge of other Mathematics, Physics‚Ä¶ languages desirable.

- Should desirably have

- Get-up-and-go attitude, knowledge of maturity, responsibility modeling techniques (logit, GLM, and strong work ethic. time trees, random forests,

- Strong ability to learn clustering) statistical programming quickly.languages (SAS, R, Python, Matlab)

- Able to integrate easily and big data tools (Hadoop, Hive, into multidisciplinary etc). teams.

- Solid academic record.

- Strong computer skills.


What we offer

We offer you the possibility to join a firm that provides all you need to develop your talent to the fullest:


- Working in the highest-profile consulting projects in the industry,

- for the largest companies, leaders of their respective markets,

- alongside top industry management as they face challenges at the national and global level,

- as part of an extraordinary team of professionals whose values and corporate culture are a benchmark for the industry.


Training

- Specialist knowledge courses, external expert courses, professional skills

courses and language courses.

- Last year our staff as a whole received over 375,000 hours of training

spanning more than 150 courses.


Career plan

- Internal promotion based solely on merit.

- Partnership-based management model offers all professionals the opportunity to become part of the Firm‚Äôs group of partners.


Complementary activities

- University: we maintain a close relationship with the world‚Äôs most prestigious universities.

- Social Action: we organize more than 30 community support activities.

- Sports Club: internal and external tournaments.


________________________________________________________________________________________


Il tuo ruolo

‚Ä¢ Elaborazione statistica dei dati (data mining).

‚Ä¢ Costruzione di modelli predittivi utilizzando tecniche di machine learning e data science.

‚Ä¢ Modellazione dei Trend (serie temporali, modelli ARIMA).

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
Il nostro scopo?


Essere la fintech bank di riferimento per le micro e piccole imprese italiane, offrendo esperienze finanziarie digitali e innovative


Cosa abbiamo fatto fino ad ora?


Siamo una fintech bank che cresce velocissima! In soli quattro anni abbiamo ottenuto la licenza bancaria, raggiunto il breakeven, siamo stati tre volte tra LinkedIn Top Startups (al 1¬∞, 2¬∞ e 3¬∞ posto), abbiamo lanciato 6 prodotti completamente digitali, superato i 20.000 clienti e un miliardo ‚Ç¨ di finanziamenti erogati. In poco tempo abbiamo costruito un brand giovane e solido.


Siamo 110+ AideXer: motivati, sperimentatori e pronti ad innovare il modo di fare banca!


Come Data Scientist sarai inserit* all‚Äôinterno dell'area Data Science, a diretto riporto del Lead Data Scientist.


üöÄLe tue attivit√†

  • Contribuire all‚ÄôR&D in Data Science applicata al lendingTech;
  • Collaborare con i business stakeholder di dominio individuando nuove aree di miglioramento e impiego fruttuoso di modelli di AI o soluzioni algoritmiche data-driven;
  • Progettare, testare e rilasciare modelli predittivi utilizzati real-time per le decisioni automatiche della Banca;
  • Contribuire allo sviluppo della Credit Decision Platform, la piattaforma che orchestra l‚Äôesecuzione real-time dei modelli durante l‚Äôonboarding di clienti prospettici;
  • Implementare ‚Äì tramite best-practices di MLOps ‚Äì il monitoraggio e/o la ricalibrazione dei modelli in produzione;
  • Preparare e mantenere un'adeguata documentazione sui modelli.


üß¨Le tue caratteristiche

L‚ÄôAideXer che fa per noi ha:

  • Una laurea magistrale in discipline STEM (Matematica, Fisica, Data Science, Computer Science);
  • Almeno un anno di esperienza lavorativa in Data Science (o un PhD);
  • Esperienza con tecniche di Machine Learning / AI;
  • Dimestichezza con Python e principali librerie di ML;
  • Curiosit√† intellettuale, proattivit√†, spirito imprenditoriale e gioco di squadra.


üèÜCosa ti offriamo

  • Buoni pasto;
  • Assicurazione sanitaria integrativa per te e per la tua famiglia;
  • Approccio ibrido: Ci piace trascorrere dei momenti insieme in Casa X, il nostro ufficio nel üíö di Milano, che sono l'occasione per fare finalmente una pausa caff√®, partecipare a workshop e parlarsi senza essere in mute! Ci piace anche prenderci dei momenti in solitaria da remoto per quella presentazione piena di numeri che richiede un alto grado di concentrazione;
  • L‚Äôopportunit√† unica di partecipare attivamente al nostro sviluppo e alla nostra crescita partendo dalle fondamenta;
  • La possibilit√† di costruire la tua professionalit√† interfacciandoti con colleghi di grande esperienza nel panorama bancario e digitale italiano;
  • Un ambiente di lavoro altamente sfidante e davvero formativo, in cui il tuo contributo sar√† fondamentale.


Valutiamo con molta attenzione tutte le candidature ricevute e apprezziamo moltissimo l‚Äôinteresse per il nostro progetto. Se questa opportunit√† sar√† allineata al tuo profilo sarai presto ricontattat*. Altrimenti terremo presente il tuo profilo anche per future ricerche.


Luogo di lavoro Milano

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Are you a brilliant new graduate, passionate about Big Data and Machine Learning? Do you think Artificial Intelligence is changing the world with groundbreaking innovation?

Dive into Deep Learning algorithms and cutting-edge techniques to develop human-machine interaction.




Join Reply!




WHO WE ARE

Reply is a company that specialises in Consulting, Systems Integration and Digital Services with a focus on the conception, design and implementation of solutions based on the new communication channels and digital media. Reply partners with key industrial groups in defining and developing business models made possible by the new technological and communication paradigms such as Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Cloud Computing, Digital Communication, the Internet of Things and Mobile and Social Networking.




WHAT WE OFFER

A technological nirvana. At Reply, true innovation runs in our blood. We have a nerdy heart and we are proud of it. Cool tech stack, guaranteed hands-on experience, challenges, hackathons, table footballs and free coffee are already waiting for you.
A continuous learning experience. In Reply, what you know is never enough. Choose from internal webinars, learn from other Replyers and teach others what keeps you awake at night.
A structured career. The perfect path to your achievements. Now with a brand new Graduate Programme.




WE'LL TOTALLY LOVE YOU IF YOU HAVE‚Ä¶

Academic background. With a brilliant Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or technical equivalent.
Teamwork mindset. In Reply, we believe in teamwork. Once here, your team will be your family and will guide you everywhere. We hope you will love it.
Curiosity and drive. We ask you to love what you do. And to always aim for excellence.




WHAT ARE THE NEXT STEPS

The first step of our recruiting process will be a face to face interview with the HR team and then the meetings with the technical referents.




Feel interested?




Reply is committed to embracing diversity and creating an inclusive work environment by valuing the uniqueness of people regardless of age, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality or disabilities as protected by Italian Law (L.68/99).

Furthermore, Reply is committed to ensuring a fair and accessible selection process: to help you during the recruitment process, please let us know of any kind of support you may need.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
Mavriq, parte di Moltiply Group, √® la tech company a cui appartengono alcuni tra i pi√π importanti brand di comparazione ed intermediazione online in Italia (MutuiOnline.it, Segugio.it, SOStariffe.it, Trovaprezzi.it, Switcho e molti altri) e all‚Äôestero (LeLynx.fr, Rastreator, Pricewise, Verivox). I servizi offerti dai brand di Mavriq aiutano con trasparenza i consumatori a trovare ci√≤ di cui hanno bisogno, al miglior prezzo. Siamo un team di circa 1.000 ‚Äúsmart disruptors‚Äù distribuiti in Europa, America Latina ed Asia.

Il successo di Mavriq √® legato al successo dei nostri team. Per questo, siamo oggi alla ricerca di un nuovo o una nuova team member con cui continuare a scrivere la nostra storia nel mondo della comparazione ed intermediazione online a livello internazionale.

Posizione:

Il ruolo

Per supportare la crescita dei progetti di Machine Learning per i brand Segugio.it, PrestitiOnline e altri, siamo alla ricerca di un-a Junior Data Scientist che, riportando alla risorsa Senior del team, supporter√† lo sviluppo di algoritmi avanzati per l‚Äôottimizzazione dei nostri processi di acquisizione e di gestione dei clienti.

Location

La tua sede di lavoro sar√† in Via Desenzano 2 a Milano (MM1 Gambara). Lavoriamo in modalit√† ibrida: almeno 2 giorni in ufficio e fino a 3 giorni in smart working, con flessibilit√† in ingresso e in uscita. I due giorni in ufficio sono un momento per i nostri team di aggregazione e condivisione (di idee, pause pranzo, pause caff√®, ecc.), e ci permettono di continuare ad alimentare la nostra Cultura Mavriq.

Come lavoriamo e cosa farai

Il team di Data Scientist, inserito all'interno della Funzione Marketing, si occupa di ideare, implementare e mantenere diversi modelli machine learning a supporto del business.

Nello specifico, ti occuperai di:


Realizzare progetti complessi di data analisi, con la responsabilit√† sull‚Äôintero ciclo di vita di un ‚Äúdata product‚Äù, dall‚Äôestrazione e trasformazione del dato fino alla realizzazione e alla messa in produzione dei modelli di machine learning.
Comunicare intuizioni e risultati ricavati dai dati in modo efficace e facilitandone la comprensione ai non addetti ai lavori.
Interagire con analisti ed esperti di business per identificare opportunit√† innovative.
Collaborare nella creazione di processi data-driven, definendo best-practice per la raccolta e l‚Äôuso dei dati.


Requisiti:

Di cosa avrai bisogno per il ruolo


Breve esperienza pregressa in ambito Data Science, specialmente in Machine Learning. Oppure una forte motivazione a costruire il tuo percorso in Data Science.
Buona conoscenza pratica di statistica e machine learning,
Competenza e abilit√† nell‚Äôuso Python e delle sue librerie per Data Science e Machine Learning (Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, ...)
Competenza nell‚Äôuso di database relazionali (MySQL, SqlServer, ...),
Familiarit√† con l‚Äôambiente Linux,
Approccio data-driven alla risoluzione dei problemi,
Capacit√† di lavorare autonomamente e per obiettivi, bilanciando in maniera efficiente richieste e scadenze,
Capacit√† di interagire e comunicare efficacemente con interlocutori con profili diversi (manager, business analyst, sviluppatori, ...),
Comprensione dei principali concetti MLOps come deployment e monitoraggio dei modelli,
Buona padronanza della lingua inglese (B2-C1) e italiana (C1).


Cosa troverai da noi


Ambiente di lavoro giovane, dinamico e informale, flessibilit√† di orario, smartworking, formazione continua e partecipazione a eventi e conferenze.
Sede spaziosa, open space, con diverse sale break e dotata di ci√≤ di cui avrai bisogno per lavorare.
Pacchetto di benefit, come assicurazione sanitaria di base (prevista da CCNL), buoni pasto e welfare.


Non vediamo l‚Äôora di conoscerti!

Altre informazioni:

Puoi scoprire di pi√π su di noi a questo video. Leggere le nostre Recensioni su Indeed o Glassdoor e i nostri post su LinkedIn. Familiarizzare con i nostri principi guida qui.

La ricerca √® rivolta ad ambo i sessi (ai sensi delle Leggi n. 903/77 e n. 125/91).

Si richiede esplicito consenso al trattamento dei dati personali (ex D.Lgs. 196/03 e GDPR - Reg.UE. 2016/679).

Title: Data Scientist, Italy - BCG X
Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures‚Äîand business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

We Are BCG X

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our Data Scientists and Senior Data Scientist are part of our rapidly growing team to apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across industries to drive significant business impact. You'll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions.

Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X. Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, creative, and communicative.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following


Comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams
Likes to distill complex results or processes into simple, clear visualizations
Explain sophisticated data science concepts in an understandable manner
Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools and writing code collaboratively (bonus points if you have a software development or DevOps experience)
Significant experience applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data
Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings, and can translate this into business implications for our clients
Have strong project management skills
Fluency in both Italian and English


#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies


Programming: Python


#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

We‚Äôre a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world‚Äôs most complex problems. Leveraging BCG‚Äôs global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

What You'll Do

Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

Our Data Scientists and Senior Data Scientist are part of our rapidly growing team to apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across industries to drive significant business impact. You'll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions.

Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X. Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, creative, and communicative.

We Are Looking For Dedicated Individuals With a Passion For Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research And Redefining Organizations Into AI Led Innovative Companies. Successful Candidates Possess The Following

  • Comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams
  • Likes to distill complex results or processes into simple, clear visualizations
  • Explain sophisticated data science concepts in an understandable manner
  • Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools and writing code collaboratively (bonus points if you have a software development or DevOps experience)
  • Significant experience applying advanced analytics to a variety of business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data
  • Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings, and can translate this into business implications for our clients
  • Have strong project management skills
  • Fluency in both Italian and English

#BCGXjob

What You'll Bring

Requirements

Master‚Äôs or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field

Technologies

  • Programming: Python

#BCGXjob

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.

Title: Junior Data Scientist

Partener Oracle da sempre, A.B.S. accompagna le aziende nella loro trasformazione digitale e su sviluppi web innovativi gestiti in logica agile.

√à recentemente entrata in Altea Federation portando in dote il suo expertise sul mondo Oracle e sull‚Äôintero ciclo di vita dello sviluppo del software a livello enterprise.

#DataEngineeringDataScience

L‚Äôattivit√† prevede lo studio e lo sviluppo di soluzioni legati al data science e al data engineering, partendo dalle pipeline dei dati fino ai servizi di reportistica. Il lavoro √® in modalit√† ibrida. Come membro del Team Solutions, avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† e la responsabilit√† di formarti sullo sviluppo in cloud, sul data science e il data engineering, lavorare su progetti nell‚Äôambito del data engineering e il data science, partecipare allo sviluppo interno del team data science con idee e poc.

Le tue abilit√† relazionali faranno la differenza nel raggiungimento degli obiettivi.

Title: Data Scientist Analyst
Description:
Company Description.

Moviri started as a research spinoff at Politecnico of Milan and was incubated at its startup accelerator.

Data and experimentation are part of our DNA: it is for this reason that we continuously focus on research, emerging ideas, and new technologies, routinely partnering with top academic and engineering research institutions.

Moviri Consulting is the first company of Moviri and its foundation. Moviri‚Äôs professionals use data, software, and insights to solve substantial business challenges for Fortune 500 corporations, multinational banks, global media conglomerates and some of the most respected brands in a variety of industries. The Moviri Consulting Performance Engineering team optimizes performance of IT systems to make them responsive, infinitely scalable, reliable, resilient and cost-effective.




Job Description.

As a Junior Data Scientist in the Moviri Consulting Analytics team, you will be involved in a project related to:

Have the ability to work autonomously, solve complex data science problems, design and code scalable, maintainable solutions.
Leverage machine learning and statistical methods to develop, train, optimize, and evaluate models in the areas of Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Generative AI.
Own the process of data collection, extraction, and aggregation from various sources using main Big Data paradigms, ensuring data is properly formatted, synthesized, and validated for accuracy.
Deploy AI models and systems into production environments, ensuring smooth integration with existing infrastructures and workflows.
Enhance algorithms and models for optimal performance, efficiency, and reliability in real-world applications.




Full-time position at the Milan Office on Hybrid Mode.




Qualifications:

If you share our passion for consulting in the Data & AI field and possess the following characteristics, we are waiting for you:

Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Data Science, Engineering, Physics or STEM related field;
Experience on software development and programming (e.g., Python, C++, Java, R); experience on Data Science libraries (Pandas, Scikit Learn, Keras, TensorFlow, Matplotlib, fastAPI);
Familiarity with GIT, AGILE methodology, and Continuous Integration and Delivery;
Familiarity with data management and related languages/tools, database programming in SQL and NoSQL;
Familiarity with Cloud Platforms (e.g. AWS, GCP, or Azure) and Big Data Domains (e.g. Hadoop, Spark);
Familiarity with Cloud Orchestration tools to automate deployment, scaling, and management of containers (e. g. Kubernetes) and containerization technologies (e. g. Docker);
Passionate about development of Machine Learning models (e.g. Time Series Analysis, Clustering, Classification, Anomaly Detection), Computer Vision, NLP, and Generative AI.




Compensation & Benefits

Make a Real Impact joining Moviri: we're on the lookout for dynamic individuals who want to be a driving force in their field, making a significant difference from day one.
Flexibility and Trust: from the moment you step in, you're not just an employee, but you're part of the team of talented colleagues. Moviri value freedom and responsibility, giving you the autonomy to excel and contribute your best in Hybrid mode
Competitive Salary and Company Welfare: Your hard work deserves recognition! Enjoy a competitive salary that reflects your skills and dedication. As a part of our team, you'll also receive a company welfare package of ‚Ç¨600, useful for fuel, bills, as well as wellness and well-being!
Sustainability: in our office, you will always have access to fresh fruit thanks to Cortilia. In Moviri, we are committed to connecting conscious customers with local products and producers, all while prioritizing environmental and social responsibility.
Tech Your Way: choose your weapon in the tech battle! Whether you're team Mac or team Windows, we believe in equipping you with the tools that spark joy. After all, the only thing better than coding your next big idea is doing it on a laptop that suits your style!




Join our team

We cannot realize any of our ambitions or achieve any of our goals without the right talent. If this sounds like you, please apply now. It may be the start of your next chapter!

Title: Data Scientist - Global Teams
Description:
Got the drive to shape the future of insurance?

At Prima, you could take on a whole new challenge. As part of our global community, you‚Äôd be in the driving seat of your career; learning and growing with a top-tier team around you. Prima is a place where no matter who you are or what your role is ‚Äî your voice is valued.

Back in 2015, we embarked on a mission: to provide great value car insurance that is designed for everyone. And we‚Äôve come a long way, we‚Äôve created a culture where we can fuel each other‚Äôs success. But we need your expertise, as we steer things in a new and exciting direction.

You‚Äôre probably thinking‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòThat sounds pretty good‚Äô. We agree.

As well as great colleagues and engaging projects, there are loads of ways we can help you do the best work of your life. We‚Äôve shaped our offering to place a focus on well-being, autonomy and development. We see benefits as the fuel that will empower you to succeed, if you decide to embark on this journey with us.

ü§∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Working in a way that works for you

We believe in work-life balance and flexibility. Whether you like working from the office, home or a mixture of both. We‚Äôll help you find a balance that works best for you. We even have a policy that means you can work from any location for 30 days a year. We trust you to steer us forward.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

At Prima, Data Scientists are part of the Pricing & Underwriting department , working within global teams that drive our international strategy. By applying for this role, you'll be considered for one of two global teams, and during the hiring process, we'll determine the best fit for your skills and expertise.

Our Global Pricing & Underwriting Teams are at the forefront of shaping our international strategy through data, analytics, and innovation. They transform complexity into structured, proactive solutions, enabling each market to identify opportunities for improvement and drive continuous growth.

By combining strategic vision with cutting-edge analytics, the team ensures a seamless approach to pricing and underwriting. Their work spans from defining and executing global strategies to developing advanced machine learning models and optimizing data pipelines. Through collaboration across multiple markets, they extract insights, identify scalable best practices, and enhance technical capabilities, making data-driven decision-making a core strength of Prima.

This unified approach empowers us to stay ahead in a dynamic industry, leveraging data and expertise to drive innovation, efficiency, and sustainable success. üöÄ

Join us and be part of a global team pushing the boundaries of Pricing & Underwriting through data.

As a Data Scientist in these teams, some of your activities could be


Design, build and evolve Prima‚Äôs proprietary predictive technology, in topics such as the prediction of future claims, tactical pricing, renewal probability, fraud detection and customer lifetime value, etc;
Define and support the implementation in each country of the key tools to understand how the business is growing, for example, conversion, retention, emerging profitability. The monitoring tools need to be consistent at a global level and at the same time able to adapt to the different stages of evolution of each country;
Support the countries in planning the pricing and UW strategy and consequent follow up;
Develop a strong critical spirit and creativity that can act as an engine for Prima's growth.


Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for


Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Computer science, Physics, Statistics, Mathematical Engineering or Physical Engineering;
From graduates to people with 2+ years of working/research experience: we‚Äôre open to evaluate the seniority during the recruitment process;
Strong Python programming skills - especially in the data domain - and fluent use of GIT;
Excellent English level, oral & written;
You have a genuine, collaborative mindset that inspires and guides others.


In addition to the basic requirements, we will carefully evaluate these characteristics as a plus


You have previous work experience in similar roles;
Knowledge of Spark, SQL or any other data-oriented programming language and proficiency with standard data wrangling and modeling libraries (Pandas, Sklearn. Keras, XGBboost, LightGBM, etc.);
Knowledge of BI tools (Tableau or similar);
Strong background in mathematical optimization, linear and nonlinear programming, convex optimization, combinatorial optimization techniques, metaheuristics (such as genetic algorithms, simulated annealing, and particle swarm optimization), and stochastic optimization methods.


Remember, research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

At Prima, Data Scientists are part of the Pricing & Underwriting department , working within global teams that drive our international strategy. By applying for this role, you'll be considered for one of two global teams, and during the hiring process, we'll determine the best fit for your skills and expertise.

Our Global Pricing & Underwriting Teams are at the forefront of shaping our international strategy through data, analytics, and innovation. They transform complexity into structured, proactive solutions, enabling each market to identify opportunities for improvement and drive continuous growth.

By combining strategic vision with cutting-edge analytics, the team ensures a seamless approach to pricing and underwriting. Their work spans from defining and executing global strategies to developing advanced machine learning models and optimizing data pipelines. Through collaboration across multiple markets, they extract insights, identify scalable best practices, and enhance technical capabilities, making data-driven decision-making a core strength of Prima.

This unified approach empowers us to stay ahead in a dynamic industry, leveraging data and expertise to drive innovation, efficiency, and sustainable success. üöÄ

Join us and be part of a global team pushing the boundaries of Pricing & Underwriting through data.

As a Data Scientist in these teams, some of your activities could be

  • Design, build and evolve Prima‚Äôs proprietary predictive technology, in topics such as the prediction of future claims, tactical pricing, renewal probability, fraud detection and customer lifetime value, etc;
  • Define and support the implementation in each country of the key tools to understand how the business is growing, for example, conversion, retention, emerging profitability. The monitoring tools need to be consistent at a global level and at the same time able to adapt to the different stages of evolution of each country;
  • Support the countries in planning the pricing and UW strategy and consequent follow up;
  • Develop a strong critical spirit and creativity that can act as an engine for Prima's growth.

Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for

  • Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Computer science, Physics, Statistics, Mathematical Engineering or Physical Engineering;
  • From graduates to people with 2+ years of working/research experience: we‚Äôre open to evaluate the seniority during the recruitment process;
  • Strong Python programming skills - especially in the data domain - and fluent use of GIT;
  • Excellent English level, oral & written;
  • You have a genuine, collaborative mindset that inspires and guides others.

In addition to the basic requirements, we will carefully evaluate these characteristics as a plus

  • You have previous work experience in similar roles;
  • Knowledge of Spark, SQL or any other data-oriented programming language and proficiency with standard data wrangling and modeling libraries (Pandas, Sklearn. Keras, XGBboost, LightGBM, etc.);
  • Knowledge of BI tools (Tableau or similar);
  • Strong background in mathematical optimization, linear and nonlinear programming, convex optimization, combinatorial optimization techniques, metaheuristics (such as genetic algorithms, simulated annealing, and particle swarm optimization), and stochastic optimization methods.

Remember, research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

Conoscenze di base in Python e prompt engineering.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
Junior Data Scientist




Are you curious and ready to accept a new challenge in your career? Are you eager to join a dynamic company and bring innovation through your work and skills?

Prometeia offers you opportunities for growth and training in a Group with over 1000 professionals working for more than 500 clients in 20 countries around the world.

We are looking for candidates interested in enriching our Data Science team, and the development of new technologies/tools related to it.




PROFILE:

The ideal candidate is a student / new graduate in machine learning / big data engineering subjects. He/she is interested in using large amounts of data to develop models and applications in the financial / insurance domain. He/she is also interested in software engineering and is willing to gain experience in the scientific computing domain.




RESPONSIBILITIES:

Critical analysis of large volumes of banking/insurance data.
Participation in the development of behavioral models using Artificial Intelligence in the areas of Risk, Wealth & Asset Management.
Participation in analysis sharing, problem solving, implementation, testing and documentation activities as part of projects assigned to the team.
Development and review of simple prototypes/analytic components within more complex pipelines.




REQUIREMENTS:

Knowledge of statistics, Machine Learning and major clustering, classification and regression algorithms.
Experience in data wrangling, cleaning, exploration, and feature extraction.
Familiarity with Python libraries and tools for Machine Learning (numpy/pandas) and scientific computing.
Attention to detail, excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Critical/experimental approach to data analysis.




NICE TOHAVE:

Ability to rapidly define ideas and solutions, develop critical analyses, and use creative approaches to solve complex problems.
Experience with code versioning systems (git).
Experience in Pyspark development.
Experience in processing and modeling with unstructured data (Text Analytics, Computer Vision)




EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE:

Bachelor's/Master's degree with excellent grades in Data Science, Statistics, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related fields (PhD in the same fields is nice to have)
Experience in a corporate environment (including internships), preferably in finance or insurance.




LOCATION:

Milan/Bologna

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Il Ruolo

Herzum √® alla ricerca Data Scientist che si uniscano al nostro team e supportino uno dei nostri Clienti nello sviluppo e nell‚Äôottimizzazione di soluzioni software basate su AI.

Progettare, sviluppare e testare prompt efficaci, ottimizzando le risposte dei modelli AI nei diversi contesti aziendali.
Analizzare il comportamento del linguaggio nelle risposte del prompt e migliorarne le prestazioni tramite sessioni di test congiunti con gli utenti finali.
Rimanere aggiornato sulle best practice nel prompt engineering e sugli sviluppi del settore AI.
Collaborare nella progettazione, sviluppo e distribuzione delle applicazioni che utilizzeranno i prompt.
Scrivere codice Python pulito e mantenibile, integrato negli ambienti utilizzati da tutti i componenti del team Automation.
Sviluppare e manutenere sistemi backend, API e interfacce utente per integrare i modelli AI nelle applicazioni di business.
Sviluppare tool di monitoraggio ed alerting per garantire la stabilit√† dei sistemi e poter gestire i costi delle integrazioni esterne (es. API cloud).



Requisiti:


Almeno un anno di esperienza nello sviluppo software, con competenze in linguaggi come Python o altri linguaggi di scripting.
Solida comprensione dell'elaborazione del linguaggio naturale, dell'apprendimento automatico e dei modelli di linguaggio di grandi dimensioni (es. GPT, BERT).
Familiarit√† con strutture dati, algoritmi e principi di progettazione del software.
Esperienza nello sviluppo e ottimizzazione di sistemi backend e API.
Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria del Software, Data Science, Intelligenza Artificiale o campi correlati.
Eccellenti capacit√† di problem-solving e un approccio orientato ai dettagli per il testing e il debugging.
Ottime capacit√† di comunicazione scritta e verbale, con la capacit√† di spiegare concetti complessi a interlocutori diversificati.



Modalit√† di lavoro: full-remote

Unisciti a noi! Entra a far parte di un team che vive di innovazione, crede nel talento e punta all‚Äôeccellenza. Il tuo prossimo passo di carriera inizia qui.

Title: AI Developer Intern - Milano [DIG]
HTML:
Trasforma le tue aspirazioni professionali in una storia di successo, entra in PwC come AI Developer Intern.

Your Perspectives

Entra a Far Parte Del Nostro Team Digital Innovation - AI Center Of Excellence In Rapida Crescita e Partecipa Allo Sviluppo Di Rivoluzionarie Applicazioni Basate Su Tecnologie Di Intelligenza Artificiale. Avrai L‚Äôopportunit√† Di

  • Sviluppare progetti basati su algoritmi di intelligenza artificiale, sia per ottimizzazioni dei processi interni o per clienti che integrati in innovative soluzioni software;
  • Contribuire attivamente alla crescita della nostra struttura dedicata all'Intelligenza Artificiale, in particolare al Natural Language Understanding e alla Computer Vision;
  • Partecipare al ciclo di vita di un prodotto basato su AI, dall‚Äôanalisi del business case, al tuning dei modelli, allo sviluppo delle componenti applicative richieste dall‚Äôapplicazione fino alla realizzazione della User Experience ideale;
  • Muoverti in un contesto organizzato, dove gli aspetti metodologici e di relazione assumono una rilevanza strategica con respiro internazionale e multiculturale;
  • Operare in un contesto organizzato, dove gli aspetti metodologici e di relazione assumono una rilevanza strategica con respiro internazionale e multiculturale;
  • Garantire l‚Äôerogazione dei deliverables di progetto concordati con il Project Manager di riferimento e con i committenti, in accordo con i vincoli di budget e quality condivisi;
  • Fornire supporto applicativo a soluzioni basate su moduli di Intelligenza Artificiale, Large Language Models e Computer Vision, sia esistenti che di nuova realizzazione.

Your unique strengths

  • Possiedi una laurea in discipline STEM;
  • Possiedi tecniche di ascolto attivo, capacit√† di sintesi e di problem solving;
  • Ti contraddistingui per intraprendenza e curiosit√†, spiccato senso di responsabilit√† professionale;
  • Possiedi una conoscenza avanzata della lingua inglese (parlata e scritta).

Set your expectation higher

PwC ti sorprender√† con un‚Äôopportunit√† di carriera che ti far√† sentire al centro della societ√†, dell‚Äôinnovazione e del cambiamento. Il tuo talento e la tua curiosit√† avranno tutto lo spazio che meritano e, attraverso l‚Äôidentificazione delle migliori risorse, contribuirai a garantire la qualit√† dei servizi che offriamo ai nostri clienti. In questo percorso di crescita sarai accompagnato da colleghi esperti e da una formazione continua e su misura grazie alla quale potrai mettere le tue competenze a disposizione dei clienti interni.

Feel at home

Ci prendiamo cura delle nostre persone, abbracciando le diversit√† e creando valore per i clienti, le persone e la comunit√†, nel rispetto dell'ambiente. GIVE YOUR LIFE A DIFFERENT PERSPECTIVE

Title: Data Scientist ‚Äì Pricing & Underwriting
Description:
Siamo alla ricerca di un* Data Scientist da inserire nel team di Pricing & Underwriting a Milano. Se hai una solida esperienza nel settore assicurativo o finanziario, passione per i dati e voglia di contribuire all‚Äôevoluzione del nostro motore tecnico, potresti essere la persona giusta!




Principali Attivit√†

Title: COMMUNICATIONS DATA SCIENTIST (IT)
Description:
Job Description

Cosa vuoi fare DI grande?

Potrai entrare a far parte di una global energy tech company impegnata a raggiungere la neutralit√† carbonica entro il 2050, che punta sulle competenze e sulla crescita delle persone investendo risorse nella ricerca di soluzioni tecnologiche innovative

Immagina Il Tuo Lavoro

Come Communications Data Scientist, farai parte del Datalab della struttura di Comunicazione Esterna, supportando i lavori del team per individuare pattern rilevanti da dati complessi e di diversa natura. La risorsa svilupper√† modelli di machine e deep learning, utilizzer√† modelli di AI e lavorer√† a stretto contatto con Data engineer per tradurre tali modelli in soluzioni scalabili su infrastruttura cloud aziendale.

Attivit√† Principali


Affiancare e monitorare i data scientist nell‚Äôimplementazione di modelli statistici per la data analysis (modelli di forecasting, trend & anomaly detection, sviluppo di algoritmi di Machine Learning)
Supportare il proprio Responsabile nel supervisionare i progetti in produzione basati su pipeline di dati e algoritmi di machine learning (ML) e intelligenza artificiale (AI) in ambiente cloud
Collaborare con il team ICT dedicato per la progettazione, implementazione e monitoraggio delle pipeline di dati, al fine di garantire l'efficienza e la scalabilit√† delle soluzioni ML e AI, nonch√© l‚Äôaderenza rispetto alle guidelines aziendali di Responsible AI
Collaborare con il team allargato per comprendere le necessit√† e i requisiti espressi dai clienti interni e tradurli in possibili soluzioni data science e AI
Ottimizzare lo sviluppo delle soluzioni individuate attraverso un adeguato utilizzo dei database a disposizione ed un adeguato project design.


Caratteristiche Richieste


Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria informatica, Fisica, Statistica, Matematica applicata o discipline collegate
Fino a 3 anni di esperienza lavorativa con ETL, data processing, gestione di database e data analytics
Conoscenza di metodologie di modellazione e ottimizzazione statistica
Conoscenza di AWS e dei moduli dedicati alla gestione e analisi dei dati e all‚Äôutilizzo di modelli di data science e Intelligenza Artificiale (Athena, S3, Sagemaker, Bedrock, Redshift)
Conoscenza dei modelli di Generative AI (Amazon Nova, Anthropic Claude, Llama)
Conoscenza di sistemi AI a supporto della produttivit√† individuale (MS Copilot)
Conoscenza delle tecniche di elaborazione del linguaggio naturale (NLP), inclusi algoritmi di deep learning come Reti Neurali Ricorrenti (RNN), Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), Gated Recurrent Units (GRU), Reti Neurali Convoluzionali (CNN), modelli Transformer, BERT e GPT
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese


Completano Il Profilo


Conoscenza di Gephi e di tecniche di Social Network Analysis (SNA)
Conoscenza di tecniche di data science e AI per analisi di intelligence su fonti Open Source
Conoscenza di tecniche di data science e AI per analisi delle serie temporali
Conoscenza dei principi di base della Responsible AI


Sede

San Donato Milanese

Promuoviamo forme flessibili di lavoro, offrendo opzioni di Smart working ed orari flessibili al fine di sostenere il maggior equilibrio tra vita professionale e personale.

Proponiamo


Contratto di lavoro a Tempo Indeterminato / Apprendistato professionalizzante ‚Äì in base all‚Äôesperienza maturata; il nostro contratto collettivo nazionale di lavoro di riferimento √® il CCNL Energia e Petrolio/Chimico
Sistema di reward e programma articolato di benefits ed iniziative di welfare. Scopri di pi√π: link welfare
Ambiente di lavoro in cui ognuno possa sentirsi riconosciuto e apprezzato nella propria unicit√†


I candidati ritenuti di maggior interesse saranno contattati per le fasi successive.

Per informazioni sul processo di selezione e consigli utili puoi cliccare qui .

Chi Siamo

Eni √® una societ√† integrata dell‚Äôenergia impegnata nella transizione energetica con azioni concrete per raggiungere la neutralit√† carbonica entro il 2050.

Il modello di business punta alla creazione di valore di lungo termine per tutti gli stakeholder, presidiando tutta la catena del valore dell‚Äôenergia.

Diversificazione energetica e neutralit√† tecnologica guidano le scelte strategiche nel percorso di decarbonizzazione, con l‚Äôobiettivo di una transizione giusta e inclusiva.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Il team

Entrando a far parte del nostro team di Data Science & AI, all'interno del Data, AI & Automation Office, avrai l'opportunit√† di collaborare con i principali decision maker in azienda, con esperti riconosciuti nel campo di Data Science e Intelligenza Artificiale in un ambiente dinamico, orientato alla crescita, focalizzato sul cliente, per rafforzare la posizione di leadership di Wind Tre come organizzazione ‚ÄùAI-powered‚Äù.




‚Äã

Cosa farai

Siamo alla ricerca di Data Scientists appassionati e motivati a guidare l‚Äôinnovazione in Wind Tre, utilizzando dati e algoritmi per personalizzare l‚Äôesperienza cliente e ottimizzare i processi di business di tutta l‚Äôorganizzazione.




All‚Äôinterno del team ti occuperai di:

Cooperare all‚Äôinterno del team Data Science e di team cross-funzionali di business per assicurare la realizzazione di modelli performanti e scalabili.
Collaborare con i principali stakeholder e decision maker dell‚Äôorganizzazione per guidare un‚Äôactionability efficace degli algoritmi con focus sulla generazione di valore.
‚ÄãApplicare diversi modelli e algoritmi, sperimentando le pi√π recenti innovazioni metodologiche, a problemi di business complessi e sfidanti.
‚ÄãLavorare su uno stack tecnologico cloud-based moderno e scalabile e su un ecosistema dati variegato e ad elevatissimo volume.
‚ÄãCollaborare alla standardizzazione delle best practice e dei processi di Data Science e AI, insieme a un grande team di esperti.




Sede Milano




Chi sei

‚ÄãLaurea magistrale o dottorato in facolt√† ingegneristiche, matematiche o economico-statistiche.
‚ÄãEsperienza pregressa nei ruoli Data Scientist o AI Engineer.
‚ÄãOttima conoscenza della statistica di base e dei moderni algoritmi di Machine Learning(classificazione, clustering, previsione, raccomandazione, reinforcement learning) e data workflows (ingestion, cleaning, feature engineering, training, scoring e inference).
Solide competenze analitiche ed esperienza sui processi di sviluppo e sul ciclo di vita dei modelli end-to-end dalla prototipazione all‚Äôingegnerizzazione e messa in produzione.
‚ÄãOttime capacit√† di sviluppo con linguaggi Python , SQL e scripting, in particolare librerie/strumenti come pandas, scikit-learn, matplotlib, git.
Esperienza con modelli GenAI, possibili applicazioni e prompt engineering.
Buona conoscenza della lingua Inglese scritta e parlata.
Forte propensione al lavoro in team, al problem solving e orientamento al risultato.
Capacit√† di comunicare risultati analitici a stakeholder di business.
Nice-to-have: esperienza su training, tuning e utilizzo avanzato di Language Models e/o Vision-Language Models (embeddings, transformers, encoder-decoder, decoder-only).
Nice-to-have: esperienza pregressa su servizi cloud in particolare Google Cloud.




Chi siamo

WINDTRE fa parte della multinazionale CK Hutchison Holdings Limited. √à l'operatore mobile numero uno in Italia, tra i principali gestori alternativi nella connettivit√† fissa e si propone come azienda multiservizi per le famiglie e per le aziende.

Noi di WINDTRE esistiamo per eliminare qualsiasi distanza tra le persone. Vogliamo essere la compagnia di telecomunicazioni da scegliere ogni giorno per garantire a tutti una vita e un futuro migliore. Crediamo che la tecnologia sia la chiave per una maggiore inclusione e per migliorare l‚Äôambiente, la salute e la qualit√† della vita delle persone.




Cosa offriamo

Retribuzione annua lorda commisurata alle competenze e all‚Äôesperienza maturata.
Inserimento contrattuale a tempo indeterminato.
Pacchetto Welfare aziendale spendibile in un sistema integrato di iniziative, convenzioni e servizi tra cui mobilit√† sostenibile, agevolazioni per la famiglia, iniziative per il benessere e la salute individuale.
Principali benefit: buoni pasto, fondo sanitario, telefono e SIM aziendale.
Percorsi di formazione.
Smartworking.




ll nostro impegno verso la diversit√† e l‚Äôinclusione

Sosteniamo una cultura aperta, inclusiva e rispettosa, dove tutte le persone possono esprimere le proprie unicit√†, competenze e potenzialit√† valorizzando il dialogo, il senso di appartenenza e la partecipazione.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Main responsibilities

KPI design, creation, monitoring to constantly improve business outcomes
Interaction with other BU in order to identify business needs and develop data driven solutions
New products development leveraging mathematical and statistical models implementation
Managements and analysis of big data with many different tools and architectures
Create data visualizations that communicate your findings in a dynamic way







Year of experience: 1-2 years




Requirements (MUST HAVE)

STEM degree (Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering or related disciplines)
Knowledge of R and Python
Knowledge of ETL techniques and statistical model application
Basic knowledge of database
Fluent Italian and English
Communication skills
Good teamwork attitude







Requirements (NICE TO HAVE in descending order)

Knowledge of SQL language
Knowledge of data visualization tools (Tableau preferred)
Knowledge of Google Cloud Platform or other Cloud Platform
Familiar with media industry and marketing concepts

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Milan, IT

Octopus Energy Italia üáÆüáπ ‚Äì Data /

Full-time /

Hybrid



Benvenuti nel futuro dell‚Äôenergia!

La missione di Octopus Energy √® rendere l‚Äôenergia rinnovabile accessibile a tutti.

Grazie alla tecnologia, stiamo guidando la rivoluzione energetica a livello globale, offrendo energia pulita a prezzi convenienti e un servizio clienti sbalorditivo.

Se non ti piacciono le sfide non inviarci la tua candidatura ;)

In Octopus Energy non amiamo la burocrazia, le regole troppo stringenti e le offerte commerciali poco chiare.

Vogliamo rivoluzionare il mercato energetico italiano. Per farlo, siamo alla ricerca di persone motivate, che condividano i nostri stessi valori.

Se hai a cuore il futuro del nostro pianeta e vuoi aiutarci a migliorare il settore energetico, unisciti al nostro team!

Con la crescita vertiginosa che stiamo avendo in Octopus, √® emersa la straordinaria opportunit√† di fare la differenza andando a utilizzare in modo intelligente e creativo la grande mole di dati che ogni giorno gestiamo come compagnia energetica. Per fare questo abbiamo quindi deciso di aprire una posizione come Senior Data Scientist.

Cosa farai


Utilizzando le risorse disponibili (e.g. datalake), potrai aiutare i vari team sviluppare modelli/Dashboard/strategie Data driven
Produrrai analisi approfondite dei dati per estrarre insight utili e solidi utili al fine di prendere delle decisioni
Svilupperai la nostra suite di reportistica utilizzando gli strumenti di BI e uno stack tecnologico moderno
Consoliderai e integrerai l'architettura dati alla base dei futuri progetti di analisi
Identificherai proattivamente nuove aree di lavoro e opportunit√† di miglioramento
Comunicherai concetti complessi in modo efficace e con confidenza.
Svilupperai modelli di machine learning a supporto di decisioni complesse



Cosa ti serve

Title: DATA SCIENTIST - BUSINESS UNIT MERCATO
Description:
Chi cerchiamo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist all‚Äôinterno della struttura Data Office della Business Unit Mercato.¬†

La struttura svolge analisi avanzate sui dati con metodi di data science e machine learning, sviluppando e gestendo modelli di predizione, classificazione e segmentazione della Customer Base in grado di abilitare processi di business e promuovendo un approccio data driven che valorizzi il patrimonio informativo aziendale, favorendone l‚Äôintegrazione con diverse fonti interne e l‚Äôarricchimento con dati esterni. Analisi e modelli sono a supporto delle attivit√† commerciali ed operative delle societ√† della Business Unit Mercato, fra cui A2A Energia, NeN (Yada Energia), Energy Solutions, oltre ad altre societ√† controllate.

Per quale societ√†

L‚Äôinserimento avverr√†¬†in A2A S.p.A. per le attivit√† di Data Science della Business Unit Mercato che √® finalizzata alla vendita al dettaglio di energia elettrica e di gas naturale ai clienti del mercato libero e alla commercializzazione ai clienti serviti in regime di tutela. Inoltre, si occupa di fornire servizi di efficienza energetica e di mobilit√† elettrica.

Ti occuperai di


Data exploration & cleaning
Data enrichment da fonti dato esterne, sia strutturate che non strutturate
Analisi statistiche sui dati con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottenere insights utili al business
Supporto nelle diverse fasi di sviluppo di modelli di machine learning: feature selection & engineering, resampling & training, testing & cross validation, hyperparameters optimization, industrializzazione (MLops)
Valutazione delle prestazioni di modelli di machine learning


Sei la persona giusta se ti riconosci in questo profilo


Laurea Magistrale in discipline matematiche, statistiche o ingegneristiche
Esperienza pregressa di 1-2 anni nel campo dell‚Äôanalisi dati in aziende del settore Energy/Utility, TLC o in aziende di consulenza per clienti finali in questi settori
Esperienza in strumenti e tecniche di data exploration, data mining e machine learning
Conoscenza pratica dei linguaggi R e Python
Conoscenza pratica dei database relazionali e del linguaggio SQL
Conoscenza pratica di almeno una piattaforma cloud (GCP, AWS, MS Azure), con preferenza per Google Cloud Platform
Capacit√† di lettura e comprensione di documentazione tecnica in lingua inglese
Rappresenta un plus la conoscenza dei principali strumenti di CI/CD (Docker, Git)
Completano il profilo: curiosit√†, attitudine all‚Äôapprendimento, proattivit√†, predisposizione al lavoro in team e alla condivisione delle informazioni


Che cosa offriamo


Flessibilit√†:¬†settimana lavorativa con venerd√¨ a orario ridotto, flessibilit√† negli orari di entrata/uscita e pausa pranzo; Smartworking sino al 60% dell‚Äôorario di lavoro su base bimestrale
Buoni pasto elettronici
Salute e benessere: assistenza sanitaria integrativa,¬†supporto psicologico attraverso counseling, webinar dedicati al benessere psicofisico e vaccino antinfluenzale
Famiglia: A2A Life Caring, iniziativa a supporto della genitorialit√† attraverso un mese aggiuntivo retribuito al 100% per maternit√†/paternit√†, rimborsi spese per figli, convenzioni con asili nido, team coaching per neogenitori; spazio caregiver,¬†offriamo webinar e uno spazio di ascolto dedicati a chi si prende cura di persone fragili o non autosufficienti
Formazione e sviluppo: programma di induction dedicato ai nuovi assunti,¬†gestione dei talenti, corsi di formazione e possibilit√† di crescita interna e job rotation tramite candidatura interna
Risparmio e tempo libero: oltre 300 convenzioni, tra cui trasporti pubblici, attivit√† sportive, viaggi, eventi culturali, e offerte speciali per luce e gas. Opzioni per il car sharing e la conversione del premio di risultato in benefit di welfare
Ambiente di lavoro:¬†promuoviamo una cultura che valorizza la diversit√†, l‚Äôequit√† e l'inclusione (DE&I); potrai inoltre avere la possibilit√† di unirti a un team dedicato allo sviluppo di iniziative e progetti su queste tematiche. Sosteniamo l'evoluzione tecnologica e offriamo strumenti e risorse per promuovere il lavoro digitale.


Saranno valutate esclusivamente le candidature inviate tramite il Sito Carriere aziendale.

Ci impegniamo ogni giorno per creare un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo e innovativo, fondato sul rispetto,¬†sull‚Äôetica e sulle pari opportunit√† garantendo la valorizzazione della diversit√†.
